import React from "react"; import {Helmet} from "react-helmet"; import Config from "../Config.json"; const TITLE = "News | " + Config.SITE_TITLE; const DESC = "This is the news page of the VIStA Research Group."; const CANONICAL = Config.SITE_DOMAIN + "/news"; class News extends React.Component{ render() { let slideIndex = 1; showSlides(slideIndex); return (
{TITLE}

News

First Month

); } } export default News;
